user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user login with multi-factor authentication and data protection mechanisms.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system that enables users to securely log in to the self-service banking portal using credentials and multi-factor authentication. Ensure encryption of user data in transit and at rest, compliance with banking security standards, and protection against common cybersecurity threats such as phishing and brute-force attacks. Establish secure session handling and automatic logout policies for inactive users.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and develop a personalized dashboard showing user-specific banking information and product recommendations.
epics.description: Create a dynamic dashboard interface that displays a summary of the user's accounts, available products, and personalized service recommendations based on eligibility and profile data. Include quick access widgets for recent activities, pending applications, and analytics such as balance summaries and spending trends. Ensure the layout is intuitive and adaptable to the user’s preferences.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
epics.summary: Implement workflows to handle new account openings and modification requests efficiently with minimal steps.
epics.description: Develop automated workflows allowing users to apply for account openings, service modifications, or product updates through guided and minimal-step forms. The system should validate data inputs, handle document uploads for verification, and ensure correct routing of requests to relevant backend systems. Focus on usability, clarity, and reducing manual intervention.

epics.title: Real-time Notifications and Request Tracking
epics.summary: Enable real-time tracking of submitted requests and send automatic notifications to users for status changes.
epics.description: Implement a notification and status tracking system that updates users in real-time about the progress of their requests and applications. Integrate email and in-portal notifications for milestones such as submission, approval, rejection, or additional document requests. Provide a history view of all transactions and service interactions for transparency and user convenience.

epics.title: Application Continuity and Document Management
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and upload necessary documents within the portal.
epics.description: Develop functionality that enables users to save partially completed forms and resume them later from any device. Incorporate a secure document upload and management feature, supporting various file formats. Ensure validation, virus scanning, and secure storage of uploaded documents, maintaining compliance with data protection regulations.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking systems for smooth data exchange.
epics.description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking infrastructure through APIs or secure middleware. Ensure bidirectional synchronization for account details, application data, and transaction updates. Implement messaging and error-handling frameworks to ensure reliability and data consistency during integration processes.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement role-based access control to ensure proper authorization and service visibility based on user profiles.
epics.description: Create a robust access management framework that defines and enforces role-based permissions. Ensure that users only access services and data relevant to their authorization level, maintaining compliance with internal policies and security regulations. Provide administrative tools for modifying roles and permissions dynamically.

epics.title: Responsive Design and Multi-Device Compatibility
epics.summary: Ensure the portal provides a consistent and responsive user experience across all device types.
epics.description: Develop a responsive user interface that adapts seamlessly to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Implement modern front-end frameworks and responsive design patterns to provide a unified experience regardless of screen size. Optimize performance for faster load times and ensure accessibility and ease of use across platforms.

epics.title: Audit Logging and Data History
epics.summary: Implement comprehensive audit logs capturing all user actions and interactions for compliance and transparency.
epics.description: Create an audit logging mechanism that records every critical user interaction, system event, and request lifecycle. Provide interfaces for authorized users to view historical data of applications, modifications, and communication events. Ensure logs are securely stored and easily retrievable for compliance, debugging, and user transparency purposes.
